Name: 收获大师
Description: Picking fruit and logs off the ground will get you far in this place. Here is a milestone for gathering lots of stuff up.

Name: 聊天盒
Description: Being friendly and making friends is an adventure on it's own! Be sure to chat with everyone every day! You might learn something.

Name: 错误捕捉器
Description: Catching bugs is a great activity. Here is a milestone for catching some of those creepy crawlies.

Name: 疯狂制作
Description: Crafting useful things yourself is a handy skill in a place starting off with nothing. Here is a milestone for crafting items.

Name: 超级品尝师
Description: Fruit? Meat? Fungus? It doesn't matter. Food will give you energy to keep doing your tasks all day long. Here is a milestone for eating things!

Name: 走来走去
Description: Staying in one spot isn't generally considered exploring. You're going to cover some distance, that's for sure! Here is a milestone for travelling!

Name: 精明的购物者
Description: Nothing wrong with spending some of that hard-earned dosh. Here is a milestone for spending Dinks.

Name: 企业家
Description: Making that bread. That cold hard cash. Nothing wrong with making a bit of a profit. Here is a milestone selling stuff for money.

Name: 烧烤大师
Description: Chuck another steak on the barbie, mate. A milestone for grilling up some meat to eat!

Name: 绿拇指
Description: Planting seeds in the red dirt. They grow up so fast. Here is a milestone for planting some seeds.

Name: 湿拇指
Description: Watering plants is good for your soul and good for the plants general health. It's win-win. So here is a milestone for watering a lot of plants!

Name: ロックオン
Description: Smashing rocks is hard work. But sometimes they have stuff in them! Here is a milestone for smashing rocks.

Name: 鉱石か何もない
Description: You've smashed a couple of them rocks filled with ore. Here is a milestone for smashing ore deposits.

Name: 做酒吧
Description: Smelting. Oh, you've been smelting alright. Here is a milestone for smelting ore into bars.

Name: 磨碎
Description: Grinding rocks down into powder. Here is a milestone for using a stone grinder a bunch.

Name: 木材！
Description: Sometime trees get in the way and sometimes you just need to borrow their wood for a bit. Here is a milestone for chopping down trees.

Name: 陷入困境
Description: You can't just chop a tree down and leave the stump. Here is a milestone for getting rid of the lil' stumps that are there after the tree falls down.

Name: 会好起来的
Description: You like wood, right? But what about square wood? Here is a milestone for cutting wood into planks.

Name: 鱼捕手
Description: You've caught a bunch of fish. Here is a milestone for catching a bunch of fish!

Name: 割草机
Description: No matter how much you clear it seems to come back. Mowing never ends. Here is a milestone for chopping grass.

Name: 一切猎人
Description: Hunting is sometimes necessary. Here is milestone for hunting creatures.

Name: 陷阱时间
Description: Trapping animals for relocation is a kind way to deal with them. It's not easy to do, either! Here is a milestone for trapping an animal.

Name: 家具花式
Description: Buying furniture for your home? Maybe a gift? Here is milestone for buying furniture.

Name: 墙变
Description: New walls. Same old house. Here is a milestone for buying wallpaper.

Name: 地板变化
Description: Here is a milestone for buying flooring.

Name: 种子销售
Description: Here is a milestone for buying seeds.

Name: 收割者
Description: Reap what you have sewn. Here is a milestone for harvesting crops.

Name: 最佳
Description: Looking good in some new threads. Here is a milestone for buying clothes

Name: 裤子
Description: Cooked fruit. Sounds gross, I know. It might be... Anyway, here is a milestone for cooking fruit.

Name: 鞋子
Description: Mixing things all together to make something? You're a bloody chef, I'll tell you what. Here is a milestone for cooking at the cooking table.

Name: 面对
Description: Always replace what you've taken. Here is a milestone for planting tree seeds.

Name: 路径工匠
Description: What are fish doing in the ocean when they could be put to good use lining your pockets. Here is a milestone for selling fish.

Name: 篱笆提琴手
Description: Bugs are everywhere. For some reason, John wants them. Here is a milestone for selling bugs.

Name: 路径放置器
Description: You've got to squeeze for every Dink you can. Even if it means dealing with shells. Here is a milestone for selling shells.

Name: 围栏二传手
Description: Farming has paid off. You've reaped what you have sown. Here is a milestone for selling plants.

Name: 考古学家
Description: There is stuff everywhere underground. Here is a milestone for digging up treasure.

Name: 埋果
Description: Bury fruit and get a fruit tree! You beauty! Here is a milestone for burying fruit.

Name: 珍珠采摘机
Description: Here is a milestone for diving for treasure.

Name: 宠物彼得
Description: You treat your feathered and furred friends well. Here is a milestone for petting your animals.

Name: 农场饲养者
Description: You feed them every day so they will love you. Here is a milestone for feeding your animals.

Name: 深度矿工
Description: Deep down in the shifting mines, it's dangerous... but you've been there a bunch! Here is a milestone for entering the mines.

Name: 乐于助人的朋友
Description: You help anyone that asks, eh? Here is a milestone for doing a lot of favours.

Name: 中毒的人
Description: Being poisoned might not kill you, but it will take a lot of energy out of you. Here is a one time milestone for being poisoned. But try not to be from now on, okay?

Name: 损坏海绵
Description: You sure can take a hit or two. Here is a milestone for taking damage.

Name: 勤劳的人
Description: Watch your energy. If you push yourself too far or if you stay out too late you will faint. You'll lose stuff if you pass out. Here's a milestone for fainting, but try not to from now on.

Name: 笔友
Description: The more friendly you are with someone the more likely they will send you mail! Here is a milestone for receiving letters.

Name: 家庭主妇
Description: From tent, to house to even bigger house! Here is a milestone for upgrading your home.

Name: 冒険者
Description: Every adventure starts somewhere and yours starts here. Here is a milestone for placing the base tent.

Name: 露营者
Description: A place to rest your head - Your new home for now. Here is a milestone for placing your tent.

Name: 城市规划师
Description: Building the town - one building at a time. Here is a milestone for finishing a new building!

Name: 配备
Description: You can buy a lot of useful tools to help you! Here is a milestone for buying tools.

Name: 粉碎
Description: What are these things even made of? Here is a milestone for breaking tools.

Name: 登上
Description: You always go out of your way to help people who have posted on the bulletin board. Here is a milestone for completing tasks from the bulletin board.

Name: 昆虫学家
Description: You make sure you document all the different bugs you've caught. Here is a milestone for adding new species of bugs to your Pedia.

Name: 鱼学家
Description: You make sure you document all the different fish you've caught. Here is a milestone for adding new species of fish to your Pedia.

Name: 产品处理器
Description: You are documenting all the wildlife here on the island. Here is a milestone for adding a new animal to your Pedia.

Name: 产品处理器
Description: Take those animal products and make them better! Here is a milestone for making something from animal products.

Name: 鸡蛋精
Description: They crack easy, but they sell for a bit! Here is a milestone for selling eggs.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: You've gotta give back after you take. Here is a milestone for planting wild seeds for grass, bushes and trees.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Pick up some dirt, put it there. Here is a milestone for moving soil.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: What if you take the tools from John's shop and make them better? Here is a milestone for upgrading tools.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Travelling on foot is for fools. Here is a milestone for travelling in style via vehicle.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Here is a milestone for getting haircuts.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Saving money in the bank. Clever. Here is a milestone for having a cold hard Mil.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Giving an animal a new home is a great thing. Here is a milestone for buying a new animal friend.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Crab pots don't always catch crabs, but when they do, it's crab night! Here is a milestone for catching something in your crab pot.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Milestone for selling fossils.

Name: 野生播种机
Description: Milestone for selling Wary Mu eggs.

Name: Hive Head
Description: Beehives. You can smash 'em or sell them. Here is a milestone for selling a beehive.

Name: Bee Keeper
Description: Keeping your bee's happy and they will give you a little honey. Here is a milestone for collecting honey.

Name: Painter
Description: Painting things gives them their own flair. Here is a milestone for making something your own with a nice paint job.

Name: Shark Hunter
Description: Going on a fishing trip but you caught a shark. Crikey! Here is a milestone for reeling in a beast.

Name: Shell Yeah
Description: Shells are nature's way of littering. Here is a milestone for picking up those bad boys.

Name: Brewmatic
Description: Those flowers might be nice if I put them in a barrel and let they sit. Here is a milestone for brewing in a keg.

Name: Teleporter
Description: Tele-Towers are handy. But are you still you? Oh well, here is a milestone for using the Tele-Towers.

Name: Composter
Description: Plants love old stinky stuff. Poop. Bones. They love it all. Here is a milestone for using the composter.

Name: Wheelie Cool
Description: Move dirt from here to there. Here is a milestone for using a Wheelbarrow.

Name: Lawn Master
Description: Mowing the lawn. You're in suburbia now. Here is a milestone for mowing the law.

Name: Chopper Master
Description: A helicopter? It flies? Here is a milestone for flying like a bird.

Name: Tractor Time
Description: Now it's time to really farm. Here is a milestone for getting a tractor.

Name: Bucket Head
Description: A bucket on your head! You bloody galah. You're having a laugh. Here is a milestone for rockin a bucket on your head.

Name: Photographer
Description: Taking photos. Saving memories. Here is a milestone for taking some photos.

Name: 滑翔机
Description: Falling with style. Here is a milestone for hanging and gliding.

Name: 锁匠
Description: Unlocking doors with your keys. Where does the key go? Who knows. Here is a milestone for using keys.

Name: 乳制品好
Description: Here is a milestone for milking Vombats.

Name: Hairy Good
Description: Here is a milestone for shearing Pleep.

Name: Green Grocer
Description: Here is a milestone for selling fruit.

Name: Amber Cash
Description: Here is a milestone for selling amber.

Name: Gift Giver
Description: Birthdays are special for some reason. Here is a milestone for giving a birthday gift to someone.

Name: Ruby Runner
Description: Here is a milestone for finding a Ruby and selling it.

Name: Thunderstruck
Description: Sometimes the sky gets mad and starting throwing down bolts. Here is a milestone for getting hit by lightning.

Name: Thunder Eggo
Description: Here is a milestone for finding a Thunder Egg and selling it.

Name: Alpha Hunter
Description: Alpha animals cause havoc. Here is a milestone for defeating an Alpha animal.

Name: Fishy Dish
Description: Why keep your fish in an aquarium when you could keep them in your belly? Here is a milestone for cooking fish.

Name: Critter Catcher
Description: It's brave it dive down and grab a random critter with your bare hands. Here is a milestone for catching underwater critters.

Name: Bug Comp Champ
Description: Bug Comps are serious business. No Time for fun. Here is a milestone for placing in the Bug Comp.

Name: Giddy-Up
Description: They aren't as pretty as vehicles, but riding an animal is good fun. Here is a milestone for riding an animal for a distance.
